page.title: 13A TYPICAL DAY FOR AMY.
page.content: I wake up at 7a.m. and read until I get up at 8a.m.. I make my breakfast of cereals, sultanas and milk. I pack my recorder, reading book and topic and walk to school. When I get there I put my packed lunch in the porch and meet my friends. The bell rings at 9a.m. and we go into class. In the morning we do Maths, English,writing stories or handwriting. We have a break at 10.40 for 20 minutes when I play with my friends Claire and Robyn. Dinner time is 12.oo. Hot meals are no longer provided so we have packed lunch. School starts again at 1p.m. when we do various things. There is a break at 2.15 for 15 minutes and school ends at 3.15. I go to recorders then Robyn comes home with me. We go to ballet and afterwards we have tea. Bed at 8.30.
